text: Batuhan'ın Aslıhan'ı kaçırdığı mağarayı öğrendim efendim
english: I found out about the cave where Batuhan kidnapped Aslihan, sir.

text: Bizden başka kimse bilmiyor Eminsin değil mi?
english: No one knows but us, are you sure?

text: Ama mağaraya gidip onu kurtarmazsak ya açlıktan ölür ya da susuzluktan
english: But if we don't go to the cave and rescue her, she'll starve or die of thirst.

text: Belki de vahşi bir hayvan işini bitirir
english: Maybe a wild animal will finish him off.

text: Emir Sadeddin'in nişanlısının yaşaması şimdilik işime gelir
english: I'd like Emir Sadeddin's fiancée to live for now.

text: Aslıhan Hatun için sulhu feda edecek mi?
english: Is he willing to sacrifice the peace for Hatun?
This is the tamga of the Rye Oblast.

text: Bu at belli ki Aslıhan Hatun'a aittir
english: This horse clearly belongs to Aslıhan Hatun

text: Belli ki bu dağın yamacındaki mağaralardan birinde saklanırlar
english: They're obviously hiding in one of the caves on the side of this mountain.

text: Ben gidip Ertuğrul Bey'ime haber edeyim Sen de iz aramaya devam et
english: I'll go tell Mr. Ertugrul and you keep looking for tracks.

text: Beyine isyan töremizde yoktur Ural Bey
english: It's not our custom to rebel against the brain, Mr. Ural.

text: Bilesiniz ki ne menzilinize baş koyarım ne de yemin ederim
english: You know I won't stand in your way, nor do I swear.

text: Elini vicdanına koyup bu hırsından vazgeçesin Ural Bey
english: Put your hand on your conscience and give up your ambition, Mr. Ural.

text: Ganimetten gözü dönen beylere takvanın güzel ahlakın yolunu açasın ki…
english: May you lead the way of piety to the men who turn their backs on the spoils of the spoils...
You're all gonna bring disaster to our oba.

text: İmparatordan çekindiği için savaşı kendi çıkaramaz
english: He can't fight the war because he's afraid of the Emperor.
He's waiting for us to start the war.

text: Lakin Aslıhan Hatun'u kurtarmak için isteğini kabul eder görünmelisin
english: But in order to save Aslıhan Hatun, you must appear to accept her request.
What do you have in mind, Ertugrul?

text: Aslıhan Hatun'un nerede olduğunu bilen biri varsa o da Vasilius'tur
english: If anyone knows where Hatun is, it's Vasilius.
My Alps tracked down Aslihan Hatun

text: Nerede olduğunu az çok tahmin ederler
english: They know where you are, more or less.
...will send troops to pick up Aslıhan Hatun.

text: O askerler de bizi Aslıhan Hatun'a götürecektir
english: Those soldiers will lead us to Aslıhan Hatun.
Now I'm in a good mood.
You've made me so happy, Helena.
It's just that I have a favor to ask of you.

text: Eğer bir daha kaleye gelirse o zaman istediğin gibi cezalandırırsın
english: If he ever comes to the castle again, then you'll punish him as you wish.
I knew, I knew you'd come

text: Bu, bu adama aldırmayasın aldırmayasın bu adama
english: Don't let this man get away with it. Don't let him get away with it.
She's decided to let you go.
You can come back to me.
Oh, yay yay yay yay yay yay

text: Bilirdim, bilirdim bu sıçan deliğinde beni bırakmayacağını
english: I knew, I knew you wouldn't leave me in this rat hole

text: Sana söylemem gereken bir şey daha var
english: There's something else I need to tell you.
You'll never come to the castle again.

text: Bir daha kaleye de, beni görmeye de gelmeyeceksin
english: You'll never come to the castle again, and you'll never come to see me.

text: Gün batmadan gelip, Hanlı Pazar'ı teslim alasın
english: I want you to come before sundown and pick up the Inn Sunday.

text: Sulh için uzun uzun sohbet eder yemek yeriz
english: We'll have a long chat for peace and have dinner.

text: Emir Sadeddin, şimdi yularını tuttum işte
english: Emir Sadeddin, I've got you now.

text: O yuları bir kez tuttum ya

english: You'll be on your knees begging in front of me

text: Türklerin kanıyla kirlenen çizmelerimi sana yalatacağım, yalatacağım
english: I'll make you lick my boots that are stained with Turkish blood.

text: O Hanlı Pazar Türklerin de Ertuğrul'un da sonu olacak
english: That Hanlı Sunday will be the end of both Turks and Ertugrul

text: Bu eller, benim gördüğüm en kutsal silahlar
english: These hands are the most sacred weapons I've ever seen.
Shall I give you your first assignment?

text: ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdûhü ve resûlü
english: And his mother, Muhammaden abduhu and his prophet.

text: Birazdan Aslıhan da burada olacak efendim
english: Aslihan will be here soon, sir.

text: Ertuğrul Hanlı Pazar'ı elinden aldığım için her türlü deliliği yapacaktır
english: Ertugrul will do all kinds of crazy things because I took the Hanlı Sunday away from him.
He'll give me what I want on a platter of gold

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imle Emir Hazretleri sizi bekler Tekfur Vasilius
english: My Mr. Ertugrul and His Majesty are waiting for you, Taekfur Vasilius.

text: Duydum ki Emir Sadeddin'le alışveriş etmek istemişsin
english: I heard you wanted to shop with Emir Sadeddin.

text: Ben de seni pazarımın terazisinde tartmak istedim
english: I wanted to weigh you on the scale of my market.
Let's see what your honor is worth.
To weigh the honour of Taekfur Vasilius
It's not up to you, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Zulme uğramış bir hatunun üzerinden çıkar devşirmeye kalktın
english: You tried to pick it off a woman who'd been persecuted.

text: Bu da yetmezmiş gibi ardından oyun çevirip
english: And as if that wasn't enough,

text: devletin emirini oyunlarına alet edeceğini sandın
english: You thought you could use the government's orders to play games.

text: Anladım ki evvela senin şerefini değil
english: I realized that first, not your honor.
You need to weigh your mind.

text: Aklımın da, şerefimin de kaç okka çektiğini göreceksin
english: You'll see how much my mind and my honor have drawn.
His word in a foreign language
You've finished the heart talk, Vasilius.

text: Seninle şerefli bir komutan gibi değil
english: Not like an honorable commander with you.

text: hele hele bir Tekfur gibi hiç değil
english: Not like a tekfur at all.

text: seninle adi bir haydut gibi konuşmanın vakti geldi
english: It's time to talk to you like a common thug.

text: O halde kaleme kadar gelip benimle yaptığın
english: Then what you did with me came to the pen.

text: gizli pazarlıkları konuşmaya başlayalım Emir Sadeddin
english: Let's start discussing secret negotiations, Emir Sadeddin.
Emir Sadeddin is alone with you
For the sake of Seljuk's government.
You made a deal with me for Aslihan.

text: Daha nerede olduğunu dahi bilmediğin nişanlının
english: Your fiancée, who you don't even know where she is.

text: canı karşılığında bana Hanlı Pazar'ı verdin
english: You gave me Hanlı Sunday in exchange for his life.
The Inn Sunday is for the recordings
If you can afford it, you can fight and take it.
The inn you couldn't get with the sword
I'm here to get what's rightfully mine.
You came here to die, Vasilius.
No easy death for you, Turk.

text: Bamsı'yı bir kere daha görmek istiyorsan, o kılıcı
english: If you want to see Bamsu one more time, it's the sword.
Put it in your sheath, Mr. Ertugrul.
So much so that I didn't think you'd lure me into a trap.

text: Emir Sadeddin, Ertuğrul'la birlik olup bana tuzak kurabilir
english: Emir Sadeddin can conspire with Ertugrul and set me up.

text: O Türk benim hayatımın teminatı olacak
english: That Turk will be the guarantee of my life.
You'll wait in the Long Valley with Bamsu.

text: Şeytan bile kıskanır seni Tekfur Vasilius
english: Even the devil would envy you Taekfur Vasilius
Leave me and my commanding officer.
Before the sun sets, Bamsi will die.

text: Kahpe oyunlarınız seni de, devletini de daha fazla yaşatamayacak Vasilius
english: Your bitchy games won't keep you and your government alive any longer, Vasilius.

text: O kelleni Karacahisar Kalesi'nin surlarında sallandıracağım
english: I'll hang your head on the walls of Karacahisar Castle
I'll be waiting in the pen
Things must have gotten a little rough, Cholpan.

text: Kutluca cesedi buldu, Aliyar cana geldi
english: Kutluca found the body, Aliyar came to life
What do you intend to do, sir?
Mr. Ural, if it's Mr. Ural
That's because you never give up.
It's because you don't beg for anyone.

text: Ama sen hatunum olarak yeise düşmeyesin
english: But don't fall in love with me as my girl.

text: Benim gidip derhal Emir Sadeddin'le görüşmem gerek
english: I need to go see Emir Sadeddin right away.
Sir, as ordered, I was at Hanlı Market.
Blood in the inn took the body away again.

text: Ertuğrul Bey ve Emir Hazretleri bir olup
english: Mr. Ertugrul and His Excellency will be united
They say it's because of Hatun.

text: Sonra Alpler, Vasilius ve komutanını götürdüler
english: Then the Alps took Vasilius and his commander.
How did Vasilius get out of your hands?

text: Bamsı Alp'i rehin almış derler beyim
english: They say he's taken Bamsik Alp hostage, sir.

text: Ertuğrul ve Emir Sadeddin bir olmuş
english: Ertugrul and Emir Sadeddin are one.

text: Ertuğrul'la Emir Sadeddin nasıl bir olabilir ha?
english: How can Ertugrul and Emir Sadeddin be?

text: Yerle gök bir araya gelir mi?
english: Are the heavens and the earth united?
The sea and the desert must have been both of them?

text: Bu ne menem bir iştir Çolpan!
english: What a job this is, Cholpan!
I wanted our wedding to be in the palace.
I wanted our Sultan to know you.

text: Lakin sen hâlâ benim sualime cevap vermedin Aslıhan
english: But you still haven't answered my question, Aslıhan.
If it were up to me tonight
After being naive with the Turkmen gentlemen
I'd like to take you to my wedding.
You know, good deeds don't get delayed.

text: Aliyar abimin de bizimle nikâhımda olmasını isterim
english: I want my brother Aliyar to be with us at my wedding.
So your feud with your brother has passed?

text: Buna en çok ben sevindim Aslıhan
english: I'm most pleased about this Aslihan.
It's from our Sultan, Your Highness.
Can't we see our Müvvet, Aslıhan?
Our Sultan calls me to him at once.

text: Büyük Türkmen toyuna az vakit kalmıştır Halime Hatun
english: The great Turkmen toyun is just a matter of time away, Halima Hatun
How will all this work grow?

text: Biz akşama kadar hepsini hazır ederiz
english: We'll have them all ready by tonight.

text: Beyler geldiklerinde hak ettikleri gibi ağırlanır evlat
english: Gentlemen are welcome when they come, son.

text: Yeter ki Bamsı evladım şu kapıdan bir sağ salim girsin
english: Just as long as my Bamsi boy walks through that door safe and sound.

text: Onun yüzünden Vasilius'u bırakmak zorunda kaldım
english: Because of him, I had to let Vasilius go.
Son, don't get mad at Bamsi.
He doesn't know what he's doing.
His love has made him lose his mind

text: İmdi yapılacak her zaafın bedeli ağır olur
english: Any weakness that's to be done now is too high a price.

text: Hayme Ana, ben de elimden geleni yapmak isterim
english: Hayme Ana, I want to do my best too.
We'll get through it, God willing.

text: Seni de sağ salim gördüm ya
english: I saw you safe and sound.
I don't care if I die.
We're where you said we'd be.

text: Aldığın her nefesin tadını çıkarasın Türk
english: Enjoy every breath you take, Turk.
Every breath you take is out of this.

Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
He tried games like you, Vasilius.
Our Sultan has called me to him immediately.
The war has begun, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: İnşallah bu Vasilius yüzünden bir derde dûçâr olmayız
english: I hope we don't get into any trouble over this Vasilius.
I hope we didn't draw our Sultan's wrath on us.

text: Hakk da, adalet de bizden yanadır
english: Right and justice are on our side

text: Bundan gayrı Ural'a destek olmayacağınızı bilirim
english: I know you won't support Ural anymore.

text: Sen de onu fazla gözünde büyütme Ertuğrul Bey
english: Don't make a big deal out of him either, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Aliyar Bey, Aslıhan Hatun size emanettir
english: Mr. Aliyar, Aslıhan Hatun is in your care
As a matter of fact, she's my sister, Your Highness.
As a matter of fact, as soon as possible,
We'll see each other again, God willing.

text: Buraya tedbir almadan gelecek kadar ahmak mı bildiniz bizi?
english: You think we're stupid enough to show up here without any precautions?

text: sen de söyle Alplerine geri dursunlar
english: You tell them to stay back in the Alps.
It doesn't look good, Turgut Alphead.

text: kaldığımız yerden devam ederiz ha Bamsı
english: We'll pick up where we left off.

text: Bir dahaki sefere gelip canını alacağım Teo
english: Next time I'll come and take your life, Teo.

text: Hem de pusatlarımla gelip canını alacağım
english: And I'll come and take your life with my prats.
You're out of my hands this time, Bamsi.
You're the survivor, Vasilius. You're the survivor.
My Alps must have been a lie, brother.

text: Tez seni Artuk Bey'e yetiştirelim kardeş
english: Let's get you to Artuk Bey, brother.
The Alps, ask him to stay in order.

text: Bu yaban domuzları bir kalleşlik etmesin
english: Don't let these boars be treacherous

text: Ne oldu? Var mı bir haber?

english: Emir Sadaddin is going to Konya, sir.
He's on his way with his soldiers.

text: Konya'ya mı gidecekmiş? Beni görmeden mi?
english: Is he going to Konya or not to see me?
Let him choose his thesis line

text: Ya babasının vasiyetine uyup bizimle beraber olsun
english: Either he obeys his father's will and is with us.
I'll ask him to pay for this weakness.

text: Bamsı'nın vaziyetinden benim nasıl haberim olmaz?
english: How could I not know about Bamsi's condition?

text: Emir Sadeddin, Ertuğrul'la bir olup bana tuzak kurdu
english: Emir Sadeddin set me up with Ertugrul.

text: Davamız da seninle birlikte toprak olup giderdi
english: Our cause would be dust with you.
I'm gonna crush them all like bugs.

text: Onunla tanışana kadar ihtiyatlı ol Teo
english: Be careful, Teo, until you meet him.

text: Türkmenler devletin yanında saf tutup bize karşı birleşecekler
english: The Turkmen will stand by the state and unite against us.

text: büyük bir toy kurulacak bu gece
english: A great young man will be made tonight
All the Turkishmen will come to the inn
They can't all go to the inn.
They won't be able to enter the inn alive.

text: Hadi kardeşler, getirin Aman dikkat edin
english: Come on, brothers, bring it. Be careful.
Why don't you go and let them take a look at your wounds?
I'll talk to you after I'm young.

text: Birkaç güne eskisinden daha iyi olacaksın Bamsı
english: In a few days you'll be better than before, Bamsy.
You're gonna be all right, brother.
But it's gonna hurt a little.
Am I left with a life?
I put your arm back in place, Bamsy.
Your wounds will also bind you with a rash.
I want you to protect this arm.
God forbid you don't protect this arm.
Just so you know, it's not like that.
You can't fight with two pusats.
Give me, Isaac. Here you are, sir.

text: bu toprakların uç beyliğini layık gördüğün Ural'a
english: To Ural, whom you claim to be the master of this land.

text: Sen bu sitemleri bana edeceğine kendine edesin Ural Bey
english: Don't worry about me, Mr. Ural.

text: "Ben ne kadar ahmağım, ne kadar basiretsizim ki
english: "How stupid I am, how shortsighted I am
Despite the support of the great Emir Sadeddin
I've lost the mastery of flight."

text: Ben senin için şimdiye kadar her şeyi yaptım
english: I've done everything for you so far.

text: Bundan sonra da her şeyi yapacak kadar itimadım tamdır
english: And from now on, I'm confident enough to do anything.

text: Sen kendi itibarını yerle yeksan ettin Ural
english: You destroyed your own reputation, Ural.

text: Seninle bu topraklarda devletimi zafere götürmem
english: I'm not taking you and my government to victory in this land.

text: mümkün değildir. Gayrı ben bunu anladım
english: It's not possible, but I figured it out.

text: Nasıl hâlâ sana itimat etmemi istersin ha?
english: How can you still want me to trust you, huh?
Even your brothers don't trust you!

text: Gayrı Ural'ın icabına bakmamız gerek Aslıhan
english: We need to take care of the other Ural, Aslıhan.
I won't have mercy on Ural.

text: O vakit onu sürgün et abi

english: He'll go to hell with Cholpan.
There's no use in exile, sister.
♪ He'll turn so fast when he finds out ♪
Thank God you're all right, sir.
We found his body on the side of the road.
They say he fell off a horse and died, sir.

text: Bu işin içinde de o var
Kendine itimat eden beyleri otağında topladığını bilirim beyim
english: I know you've got your confidence gentlemen in your bed, sir.

text: Sonra onu bir daha gören olmadı
english: And then no one ever saw him again.
I don't have a choice, Aslihan.

text: Biz onu durdurmazsak her gün bir cana daha kıyacak
english: If we don't stop him, he'll kill another person every day.
Unsub Ural's murder is a means to an end.
What did he say to you?

text: Bir şey demesi mi lazım bana ha?
english: Does he have to say something to me, huh?

text: ve sana itimat ettiği için bin pişman olduğunu gördüm
english: And I've seen him regret believing in you a thousand times.

text: Utandığı için bunu söylemese de bu aşikârdır
english: It's obvious that he doesn't say that because he's ashamed.

text: Beni sırtımdan mı hançerlersin Emir Hazretleri?
english: Will you stab me in the back, Your Highness?

text: Sen ne ettiysen kendine ettin Ural Bey
english: You did what you did to yourself, Mr. Ural.

text: Hançer de sensin, o hançerle kendini delik deşik eden de sen
english: You're the dagger, and you're the one who made a hole in yourself with that dagger.

text: Emir Hazretleri, ben, ben ne yapacağım imdi?
english: Your Highness, what am I going to do now?
If you're smart, we'll make an alliance with Aliyar

text: yerle yeksan ettiğin o itibarını yeniden kazanırsın
english: You'll regain that reputation you've destroyed.

text: Ona biat etmem. Ben kimsenin kölesi değilim Emir Hazretleri
english: I'm no one's slave, Your Highness.

text: Senin ne halt ettiğin benim zerrece umurumda değil Ural
english: I don't give a damn what you do, Ural.
I'm no good to you anymore.
Maybe you'll disturb the Turkmen's peace.
That's the burden you call your head.
Don't be afraid, Helena, don't be afraid.
He wasn't going to hurt Bamsi.

text: Beyim der ki birçok fitnenin arkasında Vasilius vardır
english: My lord says Vasilius is behind many trials.
He says he's your father's killer.
Other than that, Vasilius is my master's enemy.

text: O yüzden senden de safını seçmeni ister beyim
english: So he asks you to choose the line, sir.
I'll be here tomorrow at the top of the hill.
If you have something to say, come here.

text: beyime iletmediğiniz için size öfkelidir, bilesiniz
english: He's angry at you for not conveying it to my master, you know.
He said he'd pay for it.
My master is right about everything.

text: "Zalime merhamet, mazluma zulümdür." buyurmuş Hazreti Ali Efendimiz
english: "Mercy to the oppressor is oppression to the oppressed." Lord Ali commanded.

text: Bu, öz kardeşin dahi olsa Ertuğrul Bey
english: Even if this is your own brother, Mr. Ertugrul.
Or it'll be the dagger on our backs.
The company is a difficult burden, Mr. Aliyar.
You have to kill your own brother.

text: Geçmiş ola Aliyar Bey. Allah şifa vere Eyvallah
english: May the past be past, Mr. Aliyar.

text: Allah'ın izniyle yeniden buluştuk Ertuğrul Bey. Birliğimiz daim ola
english: By Allah's grace, we meet again, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Hoş gelmişsiniz Türkmen obalarının şerefli beyleri
english: Welcome, honourable gentlemen of the Turkmen club.
The Alps will take care of you.
We have no one left. Our lives are in danger.
I don't know, we'll figure it out.

text: Gayrı zalimin zulmüne dur deme vakti gelmiştir
english: It's time to stop the tyranny of other tyrants.
It's an order from Mr. Aliyar

text: Cehennemin dibine de gitse elimden kurtulamaz
english: He can't get out of my hands if he goes to hell.
Mr. Ural, Kutluca will call you.

text: Tez gidin beyim. Ben onları oyalarım
english: Go quickly, sir, I'll hold them off.

text: Pazarda yoktur Kutluca Alpbaşım Talimhanede de yok beyim
english: There isn't one in the market, Mr. Kutluca Alpbaşim, and there isn't one in the training room.
Happy Alphead, catch up. What happened?
I saw them fleeing towards the Archpinar.
It's not like they're in the ground.

text: Siz burada ayrılın. Ben Aliyar Bey'imize haber etmeye gideceğim
english: I'm going to inform Mr. Aliyar.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, Salur, Çepni, Kızık beyleri teşrif etmediler
english: The men of Ertuğrul, Salur, Çepni, Red, didn't come.
Are we going to start without them?
They come in when they come in.
The one who kills when I say be

text: gönüllerimizi imanla dolduran Yüce Allah'ın 99 adıyla
english: In the name of the Great God 99, who fills our hearts with faith.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
There's a lot of pain in separation.

text: ve içimizdeki fitne bizi bizden uzak kılmıştır
english: And the trial between us and you has kept us away from it.
The same way the meat never leaves the fingernail.
That's not how a brother leaves a brother.

text: ve davamız da bir olmak zorunda
english: And our cause has to be one.

text: Lakin düşmanla iş birliği yapan hainler olduğu sürece
english: But as long as there are traitors who cooperate with the enemy,

text: hayalimiz var ancak bir gayeye ulaşacak

text: bu cennet toprakları yurt tutmak için
english: This land of paradise is for home.

The more we divide, the more we disappear.

Allah senden razı olsun Allah razı olsun
english: God bless you. God bless you.

text: Allah razı olsun Allah razı olsun Ertuğrul Bey
Allah razı olsun Allah razı olsun
Emir Sadeddin de Ertuğrul'a destek olmaya başladı
english: Emir Sadeddin began to support Ertuğrul
When the Emperor doesn't want war

text: kaldı ki istese bile ordumuz onca güçlükle kıvranırken
english: And even if he wanted to, our army was writhing so hard.
What can we do, Tekfur Vasilius?

text: Türklerle savaşta kullanacağımız mühimmat yakında burada olacak
english: The ammunition we use in the war with the Turks will be here soon.

text: O kervanda Türkleri bitirecek kadar çok mühimmat var
english: There's enough ammunition in that caravan to finish the Turks.

text: Bu mühimmatlar bizi uzun süre idare eder
english: These ammunitions will last us a long time.

text: Savaşa Türkmen beyliğinin birliklerini dağıtarak başlamalıyız
english: We must start the war by disbanding the troops of the Turkmen order.
This came for you Tekfur Vasilius
We'll cut them off, cut their heads off.
And this union will not be formed.

text: Bu ilk zaferimiz Fakat son olmayacak
english: This is our first victory But it won't be the last

text: Çok yaşa imparator! Çok yaşa Vasilius!
Çok yaşa imparator! Çok yaşa Vasilius!
Çok yaşa imparator! Çok yaşa Vasilius!
Çok yaşa imparator! Çok yaşa Vasilius!
Şerefli komutanlarımızı böyle mutlu görmek ne güzel
english: It's good to see our honorable commanders so happy.
We're celebrating our victory over the Turks.

text: …Ertuğrul’un o çok güvendiği birliğin bittiğinin işareti
english: ...the sign of the end of the union that Ertugrul had so much confidence in.
To the fall of the Turks

text: Bu ne güzel bir haber böyle Sonunda zafere ulaşacağız
english: That's good news. We'll finally be victorious.
To the fall of the Turks

text: Çok yaşa imparator! Çok yaşa Vasilius!
Çok yaşa imparator! Çok yaşa Vasilius!
Çok yaşa imparator! Çok yaşa Vasilius!

english: Tekfur Vasilius has already gathered his commanders.

text: Bizi ayırmanın, paramparça yapıp bölmenin hesaplarını yapmaktalar
english: They're doing the calculations of separating us, tearing us apart, splitting us apart.
One day we'll take our banner to Bitinya, to Kostantiniyye.
...and we'll plant it on Venice and even on Rome.
That's our cause, that's our faith

text: Bu dediklerin hangi vakit gerçekleşecek Ertuğrul Bey’im?
english: When will these things take place, Mr. Ertugrul?

text: Bunları görmeye ömrümüz vefa eder mi?
english: Would our life be faithful to see them?
Victory belongs to those who call it, Mr. Afshin.
If we don't live our lives, our reputation will grow
If we don't reach the point, our generation will.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, biz ancak uyuyan yılanı uyandırmaktayız
english: Mr. Ertugrul, we're only waking up the sleeping snake.
We're going to lose our peace.

text: Sen bulduğu ilk imkânda obanı yerle bir edecek olan Bizans’ı…
english: You're the one who's going to destroy the oban in the first place.

text: Bizim bizden gayri dostumuz yoktur bunu görmez misin?
english: Don't you see we don't have any friends but ourselves?
Sir, I hope you're not too busy.

text: Toya gelen üç bey yolda saldırıya uğramış
english: The three men who came to Toya were attacked on the road.
They were martyred with their Alps.
As long as we're in over our heads...

text: …işte böyle tek tek öleceğiz Ertuğrul Bey. Tek tek öleceğiz
english: We're going to die one by one, Mr. Ertugrul, and we're going to die one by one.
...go and wear a yoke and be a slave to Byzantine.
That I'd be afraid of the degenerates and go to bed...
I'll go to the grave with my honor

text: Dişe diş, kana kan İntikam almayı bana nasip et
english: ♪ tooth for tooth, blood for blood ♪ ♪ Give me revenge ♪
I'd rather die with my son than see you like this.

text: Ha, teslim mi olduk da beni erini hakir görürsün?
english: Do you think that if we submit, you will despise me?

text: Yalnız kaldın beyim Herkes sana sırtını çevirdi
english: You're alone, sir. Everyone's turned their backs on you.
We ran away from your tent in no time.
We didn't run away to gather our strength.
What do I do with the betrayal of my brothers...

text: …ne de Emir Saadettin’in sözleriyle tarumar olacak değilim
english: Nor will I be destroyed by the words of Emir Saadettin.
Whatever you do, you do what's best.
Vasilius will open the way for me.
We can't declare war on these bastards.

text: Lakin şehit beylerin kanını yerde koyacak da değiliz
english: But we're not going to put the blood of martyrs on the floor.
What do you think, Mr. Ertugrul?

text: Madem açıktan savaş ilan edemeyiz o vakit biz de gizli gizli yaparız
english: If we can't declare war openly, then we'll do it in secret.
We sneak in, we sneak out

text: Gün battı mı kalede kuş bile uçmaz beyim
english: When the sun goes down, not a bird flies in the castle, sir.

text: Komutanlar gece olduğunda ya eğlenceye gider…
english: When the commanders are at night, they either go out for fun...

text: Burada bir şaraphane vardır Eğlence için buraya giderler
english: There's a winery here. They go here for fun.

text: Teftiş için de kalenin burçlarının etrafında dolanırlar
english: And for inspection, they circle around the castle's horoscopes.

text: Anlaşılan en müsait vakit gece yarısıdır
english: Looks like midnight's the best time.
But how do we know who's who?

text: Vasilius’un en kıymetli ve rütbeli komutanları…
english: Vasilius' most valued and senior commanders...

text: …her gece ona malumat vermek için yanına gelir
english: Every night she comes to give him information.

text: İç kaleye doğru giren komutan görürseniz bilin ki onlardır
english: If you see the commander entering the inner castle, it's them.

text: Haçaturyan ile Dumrul da size destek olsun
english: Crossaturyan and Dumrul will support you.
You will take the lives of those commanders.

text: Cesetlerini de Vasilius’un gözünün önüne asasınız
english: And hang their bodies in front of Vasilius.
But I let the Alps go after him
I know where he's going, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Gayrı gözü dönmüştür Edeceği tek şey hainliktir
english: The only thing it'll do is betray.
Sir, if you'll excuse us, we'll be on our way.

text: Gayrı biz kardeş obalarız, Ertuğrul Bey Kutluca ve Alpler de gitsin
english: We're brothers, Ertuğrul Bey Kutluca and the Alps go too

text: Bu zaferde bizim de payımız olsun
english: Let us share in this victory.
There's no going back or going back.
It is our honor to testify.

text: Yeter ki sancağımız inmesin ezanımız susmasın beyim
english: As long as we don't let down our banner, my lord, our master won't shut up.
Let there be a thousand Kutlucas

text: O vakit gazanız mübarek olsun Eyvallah
english: Then blessed be your speed. Thank you very much.
May the journey be from us, and may the victory be from Allah.
They couldn't find Ural in the pod.
He's gonna get us into a lot of trouble.
We can't let it go, brother.
Don't worry, the Alps are after you.

text: Biz de tez obamıza dönelim Ertuğrul Bey yarın misafirimizdir
english: Ertugrul Bey is our guest tomorrow.
We'll sit down and talk about what to do.
Destur, sir, do you have Destur?
...the enemy will bring the mountains down on us, Bamsi.

text: Biz pusatımızı bırakırsak düşman göğsümüzü deler
english: If we let go of our pusat, the enemy will pierce our chests.
How could you be like this?
Sevda, my lord Sevda has ruined me
Master, you have every right to say

text: Beyim, beyim, keşke böyle olmayaydı Keşke aklım uçup gitmeyeydi
english: My lord, my lord, I wish I hadn't been like this. I wish my mind had been blown away.
We haven't come to this day with a wish, Bamsy.
There's no room for wishes in our case.
We're in the middle of hell.

text: Biz gaflete düştüğümüz an bu iş bitmiş demektir
english: As soon as we slip up, it's over.

text: Yarın Çavdar Obası'nda Aliyar Bey’in misafiri olacağız
english: Tomorrow we'll be guests of Aliyar Bey.
You'll be ready. It'll be your command, sir.

text: Kendi obamızın Alplerinden kaçıp babamın katillerine sığınmak…
english: Running from the Alps of our own obas and taking refuge in the killers of my father...

text: …bu bana ağır gelir beyim Lakin son nefesime kadar yanındayım
english: It's too much for me, sir, but I'm here for you until my last breath.

text: Teslim olasın Ural Bey’im Kaçacak yeriniz yok
english: You must surrender, Mr. Ural. You have no place to run.

text: …Kutluca’ya katledilmen için emir vermiş Bizi de peşine saldı
english: He ordered you to be slaughtered and sent us after you.
It wasn't enough that he killed my father and poisoned my brothers...
...now he wants to waste me, huh?
You don't even know your brother.
Do you have an order, sir?

text: Evvela bir olasınız, diri olasınız Aksi hâlde sıra size de gelir
english: First you'll be alive, first you'll be alive or it'll be your turn.

text: Obadaki sadık beylerimize Alplerimize deyin ki…
english: Tell our loyal gentlemen of the Oba to our Alps...
...Emir Saadettin His Imperial Highness is behind us.

text: Hak ettiğimiz ne varsa bize verecektir
english: He'll give us everything we deserve
The lord is the lord, and the gold is the gold.

text: Sakın ola ki Aliyar’a boyun eğmeyesiniz
english: Be that you will not bow down to Aliyar (Aliyar-Aliyar-Aliyar-Aliyar-Ali-Ali-Ali-Ali-Ali-Ali-Ali-Ali-Ali-Ali-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Yi-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-

text: Obada olup biten her şeyden haberim olacak
english: I'll know everything that's going on in the Obada.

text: Karacahisar Kalesi’ne gideceğim Anladınız mı beni?
english: I'm going to Karacahisar Castle. Do you understand me?
Come on, gather around, let's go.

text: Kayı Obası misafirim olacaktır Tez hazırlıklar başlasın
english: Kayyi Oba will be my guest. Let the preparations begin.

text: Obadaki bütün çadırlar gezile ihtiyaçlar giderile
english: All the tents in the Oba are being sold out on a trip.
The heart of those who are broken
Those of you who've been shooting in the valley...

text: Bundan gayrı Aslıhan Hatun benim vekilimdir
english: Other than that, Aslıhan Hatun is my deputy.
Is that what you're talking about?
We'll be with the Turks, sister.

text: Tarihimizde nice hatun beylik de yapmıştır, hükümdarlık da
english: There are many women in our history who have served as lords and rulers.

text: İmdi başta kendi obamız olmak üzere…
…tüm Âlem-i İslam’ı ayağa kaldırmak için var gücümüzle çalışacağız
english: ...we will work hard to raise the whole world of Islam.
My Lord, to be a martyr for this...

text: Ural’ın bu otağda topladığı beyleri yakın takibe alasınız
english: Keep close watch on the men that Ural has gathered in this tent

text: Bundan gayrı obamıza Ural’ın gölgesi bile girmeyecek
english: Other than that, we won't even have Ural's shadow.

text: O beylerden de hesabını elbette soracağım
english: Of course I'll ask those gentlemen to pay for it.

text: Efendim, neden zahmet ettiniz? Ben gelecektim huzurunuza

english: I wanted to see this place in person.

text: Bir yer fetih olunduğunda ne mübarek olur
english: Blessed is a place to be conquered.

text: Lakin fethin esası, gönülleri de fethetmektir
english: But the essence of conquest is to conquer hearts as well.
May Allah never extinguish the spirit of conquest.
Our Prophet (Muhammad SAW) is a Mercy to the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).

text: …haklının hakkını, suçlunun cezasını vermeyi kendine şiar edinmişti
english: ...he made it his duty to punish the guilty.

text: Efendimiz yeri gelmiş ashabına ilim öğretmiş…
english: Our lord has taught his fellow man the knowledge...

text: …bu şefkat peygamberi yeri gelmiş gaza meydanlarında…
english: ...this prophet of compassion is in the squares of the gas...

text: Bir beyin de birçok vasfı kendinde barındırması elzemdir
english: It is necessary for a brain to have many qualities in its own hands.
...to make sure that those who don't know what they're doing don't know what they're doing.
Our Lord says in the Surah of Bakara...

text: …”Sizinle savaşanlara karşı Allah yolunda siz de savaşın
english: ...you too fight in the way of God against those who fight you.
But do not exceed the limits.
God does not love the transgressors.

text: Bu ayet gereği ne eksiği ne fazlası…
english: In this verse, no more or less...
...that you can deal with what's been done to you...
...and let your enemies fear that they will haunt you.

text: Biz zalime karşı izzetli mazluma karşı merhametli olacağız
english: We'll be merciful to the oppressor, to the glorious oppressor.

text: Allah beni ve soyumu bu davanın bir neferi eylesin
english: May Allah make me and my descendants a means to an end.
Don't let the line separate us from my future.

text: Yaralı hâlde onu kurtardılar, Elena İmdi iyidir. Handadır
english: They saved him with a wound, Elena Imdi is fine.

text: Vasilius’un attığı her adımı takip edeceğim
english: I will follow every step Vasilius takes

text: Eğer babamın katili oysa onu kendi ellerimle öldüreceğim
english: If he's my father's killer, I'll kill him myself.
Vasilius is the one who killed the Turkish gentleman.
Go ahead, you can have anything you want.

text: İyi ya, biz de o yüzden gizlendik usta
english: Well, that's why we're hiding, Master.

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im neler düşünmüş Kaleden haberleri böyle alırsınız ha?
english: That's how you get news from the castle.

text: Elbette yiğidim. Eğer düşmanını tanımazsan onu asla yenemezsin
english: Of course I am, but if you don't know your enemy, you'll never defeat him.
I've spoken to Helena. She's with us.

text: Türkmen beylerini öldürenin de Vasilius olduğunu söyledi
english: He said it was Vasilius who killed the Turkmen gentlemen.

text: Bundan en ufak bir şüphemiz yoktu zaten
english: We had no doubt about it.

text: Biz de buraya bunun bedelini ödetmek için geldik
english: So we came here to make him pay.
They took our strollers, Master Crusader.
They won't let anyone else into the castle.

text: Korkuları başlarına vurdu Lakin çok geç kaldılar
english: Their fears struck them, but they were too late.
What do we do now, Turgut Alp?
Whoever falls into an ambush will be our prey.

text: Yine gelin efendim. Yine bekleriz Yine gelin!
Görürüm ki acımasız askerler yetiştirirsin Tekfur Vasilius
english: I see you raise ruthless soldiers, Taekfur Vasilius
If you agree, we'd like to be your guests.

text: Bilirsin, Türklere kapım her zaman açıktır
english: You know, I'm always welcome to the Turks.

text: O hâlde akşam yemek yer, konuşuruz Şimdi iyice dinlenin
english: Then we'll have dinner and talk. Now get some rest.

text: Obamıza, otağımıza hoş geldiniz Ertuğrul Bey’im, şeref verdiniz
english: Welcome to Obama, welcome to our tent, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Seni yeniden sağ salim otağında gördüm ya, abat oldum
english: When I saw you safely in your bed again, I was horny.

text: Alplere haber edin. Bakalım hazırlar mı değiller mi görelim
Kırca, sen de eşlik edesin Emrin olur beyim
english: If you'd like to accompany me, I'll be your master.

text: Sayende cenge hazır olacaklar Ertuğrul Bey’im
english: They'll be ready for war thanks to you, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Hele bir soluklan da biz de varalım Meydan yiğit görsün
english: Take a breath and we'll get there. Let the square see you brave.
We've got some guests here. Hmm?
The Alps were in the training room. Did you see that?

text: Bu obaya şöyle keyifli geldik ya şükürler ola
english: I'm glad we've come to this room so pleasantly.

text: He ya. Ne beter günlerdi ama beyim
english: Oh, man, those were the worst days ever, sir.

text: Sen de Aliyar Bey’in hizmetine başlamışsın ha Kırca Alp?
english: You've also started the service of Aliyar Bey, huh, Kırca Alp?

text: Hayırlı ola Eyvallah Doğan Alp, eyvallah
english: Thank you, Doğan Alp. Thank you.

text: Gücüm yettiğince Aliyar Bey’imin hizmetinde olacağım
english: I'll be at the service of my Aliyar Bey as long as I can.

text: İşimiz var bre, ne zorluyorsun? Çek git
english: We've got work to do, what are you pushing?
I've come a long way, old man.
Let me catch my breath. I'll get up.

text: Başımı belaya mı sokacaksın be adam?
english: You gonna get me in trouble, man?
Get up and catch your breath somewhere else.
Why would you get in trouble?

text: Akşama Tekfur ve komutanları eğlenceye gelecekler
english: Tekfur and his commanders are coming to the party tonight.

text: Eğer yabancı birini görürlerse başım belaya girer bre!
english: If they see a stranger, I'll be in trouble!
You don't know what you're talking about!
All right, all right, get up!
It's easy for you, old man.

text: O vakit ahaliyi bu eziyetten kurtarmanın vakti gelmiştir
english: Then it's time to free the people from this torment.

text: Sen bir şey bulabildin mi Turgut Alp?
english: Did you find anything, Turgut Alp?
I found it, Samsa, I found it.
I can see you're on fire. Have a drink.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

You know, when you're training, it's just, you know, it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it's... it
You're from the Kayyi Oba, aren't you?
We've come as guests to Mr. Aliyar
I mean, if he's a brother.
So you'll be coming around a lot.

text: Doğan Alp burada olacak Alplerin talimi için
english: Born Alpine will be here to train the Alps.
If you come, my name is Günyeli.
You'll be all right with your pus.
You're not gonna let it go.
Peace be upon you, Mr. Ertugrul.
Not with ambition, but with wisdom.

text: Düşman, telaşla değil sükunetle alt edilir
english: The enemy is defeated by calm, not haste.

text: Evvela karşınızdaki düşmanın kim olduğunu bileceksiniz
english: First of all, you'll know who the enemy is.
And what is the power that you weigh?
The situation of our Alps is grave.

text: Doğan Alp'le Kutluca Alp bir olup
english: ♪ Born with the Alps and the Kutluca Alps ♪

text: onları bir ayda Alp'in hası eder
english: It's worth it to the Alps in a month.
We'll beat the shit out of 'em!
His bones are yours, too, the Born Alps.

text: gayrı dostumuz da düşmanımız da birdir
english: Our friends and enemies are one.
We'll fight in the battlefield together
Then you'll have each other's backs.
You will die for your brother.
Before you take the life of the enemy

text: Bundan sebep, iki obanın birliği her vakit olduğundan daha mühimdir
english: The reason is that the unity of two obas is more important than ever.
Don't let your arrow slip away.
I need you to put it on the horse.
The saddle needs courage, the mighty
You will prove your merit in the private square.
We're going to work so we can have tradition.
We swore a thousand years later, brothers and sisters.
He trembles in the face of the cruel
A thousand years later, our generation
He listens to the voice of the cruel

text: Ne ettiğimizi de, ne ektiğimizi de iyi bileceksiniz
english: You will know what we have done and what We have sown.
The sound of every punch you take today
It'll be out in a thousand years.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Şarabı fazla kaçırıp kendinden geçmezsin umarım
english: I hope you don't drink too much wine and pass out.
Well, our commander-in-chief is getting married.

text: Bugün sarhoş olmayacağız da ne vakit olacağız?
english: When are we gonna get drunk today?

text: O halde kendine şimdiden seni taşıyacak birini bul
english: Then find yourself someone to carry you now.

text: Ne oldu ihtiyar, ne bu hâl?
De hele Dündar, hayır mı, şer mi?
english: What about Dündar, no or no?

text: Elinde tepsiyle az evvel içeri girdi
english: He just walked in with a tray in his hand.
I'll tell you what it is.
I hope it's for the best, Dündar.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Kilimhanede ne kadar becerikli olduklarını görmüştük
english: We've seen how resourceful they are in the church.

text: Lakin sofra donatmakta da pek bir mahirmişler
english: But they're very good at catering.
The one that brought us together

text: İnşallah Banıçiçek Hatun'un desteğiyle bundan gayrı genç hatunlarımız
english: With the support of the Band-Aid Hatun, we'll have other young ladies.

text: Gayrı obamız senin obandır Banıçiçek Hatun
english: Our other Oba is your oban Bonukçe Hatun
I'd like to consult with you.

text: Dündar Bey'imin gönlüne bir sevda düşmüş
english: He's got a crush on Mr. Dündar.

text: Lakin Dündar Bey'im adının Günyeli olduğunu dedi
english: But he said that Mr. Dündar's name was Günyeli

text: Bu akşam hizmet eden hatunlar arasındaymış
english: She's one of the ladies who served tonight.

text: her daim Ural'dan yana olan Acar Bey'in kızıdır
english: She's the daughter of Mr. Acar, who's always on Ural's side.
My cousin Helena, she's a lucky girl.

text: Sizin gibi cesur bir adamla evlenecek
english: He'll marry a brave man like you
Vasilius brought me back to life.
I've been gone for a long time.
He saved me from my dungeon.

text: Ee, bu kötü günlerin konuşmalarını bir kenara bırakalım ha?
english: So, let's not talk about these bad days, huh?
I want you to come here.
You want to be with me.
Well, I like to make an alliance.
But I couldn't choose my friends
Well, you're on your way to wisdom
I offer Ertugrul and Aliyar's head.
Don't make me laugh, Mr. Ural.

text: Sen obanda hayat hakkı bulamamışsın bir de beylik peşindesin
english: You don't have a life in the Oban and you're looking for a fief.
Three of our commanders were killed.
Their bodies are in the courtyard.
He's the one who doesn't give life.

text: Yenge, ne oldu? Bir haber var mı?
O kız, Ural'ın sağ kolu olan Acar Bey'in kızıdır
english: She's the daughter of Mr. Acar, Ural's right-hand man.

text: Acar Bey'in bu işe gönlü olmaz

english: He's got his eye on your castle.
What did the Turgut Alps do?

text: İnşallah zafer bizim olacaktır Aliyar Bey
english: May victory be ours, Mr. Aliyar.
We'll shoot the enemy in his own nest.
There is no revenge against the Turk
In this land, there will be no end to the persecution.

text: bu topraklarda ilahi nizam her yere yayılacak
english: In this land, the divine order will spread everywhere.
